ModMetaData.name: Dogs mate (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Revolus
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Revoluss mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2109362835
Added support for [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2021568126]Extend the Cat[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2192937058]Japanese Dogs[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2121892164]HC_Animal_1[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2053120429]Mamuffalo[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1885527800]Pygmy muffalo[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2070686241]Legacy Ark[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2236973780]Westerado[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2231295285]Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2371079000]DaJian Chinese Traditional Cultural Things Expanded[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2389095025]Elephants[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2266685892][HLX] ReGrowth - Extinct Animals Pack[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2207620932]HC_Animal_4[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2280503138]Unique Antelopes[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2366589898]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Endangered[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2000213010]Tasmanian Devils[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2274621958]Jack Russell[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2250773505]Erin's Mountain Animals[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2260502331]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Temperate Forest[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2255067914]Hyena (continued)[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2261957667]BorderCollies![/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna![/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/DogsMate][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [h1]Different breeds of cats and dogs can reproduce[/h1] There are so many different species of cat and dogs in this game and its mods. Vanilla Animals Expanded alone adds more more than ten breeds of both species. This makes it difficult to breed these animals, because normally only dogs of the same breed mate.
But since when to dogs care about their care about the breed of their mate?
[b]This mod makes it possible for different breeds of cats, dogs, bunnies, bears, foxes, wolves, hedgehogs, fishers, martens, horses, and platypusses to reproduce.[/b] Half the litter will have the father's breed, half the mother's breed. Currently only viviparous animals can be patched, no egg-laying animals.
Included are patches for: [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1836900626]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Arid Shrubland[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1963681588]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Australia[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895364938]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Boreal Forest[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1823540489]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Cats and Dogs[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895364782]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Ice Sheet[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1907283872]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Tropical Rainforest[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895364585]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Tundra[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1629060163]Let's Have a Cat![/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1915708891]Let's Have a Cat! - Version avoiding duplication with "VAE — Cats and Dogs"[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1256708879]Spidercamp's Dog Pack[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1233906319]Spidercamp's Horses[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1566921497]Shiba Wanko[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2076237940]RhodesianRidgebacks[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2020233722]Pomeranian[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2014889466]Red Wolves[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2090705625]Erin's Critter Collection[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1205488606]FFGermanShepherd[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1966193572]Martens - Nature's Most Adorable Assassins[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2115080957]SnowRats[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2113851330]FancyRats[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2028973691]Tropi[CKAPP] Rainforest Mod (Continued)[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2092915394]Dire Wolf[/url] [/list]
More can easibly be added.
[b]Only dependency:[/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2009463077]Harmony[/url]. [b]Save games:[/b] Can be added to, and removed from running games. [b]Compatibility:[/b] Should work with any mod that does not change how animal pregnancies work. Replaces JobGiver_Mate.TryGiveJob and Pregnant.DoBirthSpawn.
[h1]You like my mods (and you are somewhere in the EU)?[/h1] Then please consider [url=https://tierpark-neukoelln.berlin/spenden/]donating to the Tierpark Neukölln[/url] (Petting Zoo Neukölln, Berlin): BIC: BFSWDE33BER IBAN: DE 78 100 205 00000 316 5900 Intended purpose: Spende für Tierpark Neukölln
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
